src:
Ogromen dron za dostavo velikih paketov

04 Nov 2019, 07:45

Droni so v zadnjih nekaj letih postali že nekaj povsem običajnega, saj se uporabljajo kot orodje za zabavo ter celo kot delovni pripomoček ali varnostni sistem. Podjetje Google je celo kot prvo pričelo redno dostavo paketov z letečimi droni Wing, in sicer v ameriškem mestu Christiansburg v ameriški zvezni državi Virginija. Ker pa ti droni lahko prenašajo le manjše pakete, so pri podjetju Volocopter pripravili ogromen dron, ki je namenjen prenosu oziroma dostavi večjih paketov na območja, kjer dostava z običajnimi prevoznimi sredstvi ni mogoča.
Dron VoloDrone podjetja Volocopter je opremljen s kar 18 zmogljivimi električnimi motorji, ki lahko prenašajo tovor teže do 200 kilogramov, skupna teža drona med vzletom pa lahko znaša do 800 kilogramov. Eno polnjenje gigantskega drona zadošča za do 40 kilometrov avtonomije, potovalna hitrost pa znaša do največ 100 kilometrov na uro, medtem ko hitrost križarjenja običajno znaša 80 kilometrov na uro. Baterije so postavljene tako, da jih je mogoče zamenjati v manj kot petih minutah.
Trenutno še ni znano, kdaj bo dron VoloDrone podjetja Volocopter uporabljen za redno dostavo velikih paketov. Po vsej verjetnosti bo preteklo kar nekaj časa, preden bo podjetje pridobilo vsa potrebna dovoljenja s strani ameriških regulatornih organov.



Povezave: Volocopter
text:
A huge drone for delivering large packages

04 Nov 2019, 07:45

Drones have become quite commonplace over the last few years, as they are used as an entertainment tool and even as a work gadget or security system. Google even began shipping Wing flying drone packages on a regular basis in Christiansburg, Virginia. However, since these drones can only carry smaller packages, Volocopter has built a huge drone designed to transfer or deliver larger packages to areas where delivery by conventional means of transport is not possible.
Volocopter's VoloDrone drone is equipped with as many as 18 powerful electric motors capable of carrying loads of up to 200 kilograms and a total drone weight of up to 800 kilograms during take-off. A single giant drone charge is sufficient for up to 40 kilometers of autonomy, with cruising speeds up to a maximum of 100 kilometers per hour, while cruising speeds are typically 80 kilometers per hour. The batteries are positioned so that they can be replaced in less than five minutes.
It is unknown at this time when the VoloDrone drone from Volocopter will be used for the regular delivery of large packages. In all likelihood, it will take some time before the company obtains all the necessary approvals from US regulatory authorities.
